references.paper_title: Common Voice: A massively-multilingual speech corpus
references.reason: This paper introduces a large multilingual speech corpus used to evaluate the performance of the ASR model.

references.paper_title: Designing disaggregated evaluations of AI systems: Choices, considerations, and tradeoffs
references.reason: This paper discusses the challenges and considerations involved in designing disaggregated evaluations of AI systems, which is the core focus of the SureMap paper.

references.paper_title: Minimax estimators of the mean of a multivariate normal distribution
references.reason: This paper presents the foundational work on minimax estimators of a multivariate normal distribution, which is essential to the development of the SureMap method.
This book provides the theoretical foundation for Bayesian data analysis, a crucial aspect of the SureMap approach which models the problem as Bayesian inference.
This paper is foundational to the James-Stein estimator, which is a core baseline used for comparison in evaluating the SureMap method.
